name: Food Fight (itch) (nickbota)
description:
The world in which snacks live in - the vending machine - is a small and dangerous one, battle other snacks online in Arena Mode or try the Story Mode and escape from this hell people call a vending machine!

Food Fight is an online brawler-platformer that's super fun to play online, 4 random participants join a room and battle, fight and shove each other to see who's the supreme snack!

Controls:

WASD or the arrow keys - move

Space - jump

Left click - punch

Right click - kick

Middle mouse button - charge attack
